page.title: 05Pets in Fremington
page.content: FREMINGTON PET CENTRE Many people in Fremington are glad that we have a pet shop.The owner's name is Paul. He had only been open for three weeks when we saw him. He sells pet food and pet toys and he gives very good advice. THE VET IN FREMINGTON The vet in Fremington has about 10 on his staff.He has a lot of night calls.He was brought up with animals. He treats unusual animals, including snakes,spiders,tortoises,terrapins,and he also works with farm animals. PETS Inside the shop on one of the shelves there is dog food.On the other there is puppy meal.There are fish tanks and water bottles for rabbits, hamsters and gerbils.He has wafers and chocolate chews for dogs.
